local

Class TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • local.Transaction
      • local.TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader

  • public class TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader
extends Transaction
    Transaction provide support for used file obtaining protocol. Downloading node TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader sends MsgFileRequest with increasing MsgFileRequest.requestID with each request. Uploading node TransOfferFiles sends MsgFileOffer. If TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader wants to quit, sends MsgAck and TransOfferFilesresponds with ack too. Communication is over. If TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader) is unwilling to accept offered file(in case of some error), node sends MsgAbort and TransOfferFiles sends MsgAck. TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader may then continue with another MsgFileRequest or MsgAck to end communication. TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader will inform master about the end of the transmition. TransEnlightSlowNodeFinished
    Author:
    Ivan Straka
    See Also:
    TransOfferFiles, TransEnlightSlowNodeFinished
